comments:
1. create new text file
2. open-close
3. grab snapshot using sleak
4. open-close
5. diff using sleak

There is 1 image leaking each time text editor (and all editors that extend it) 
opens/close.

Actually, the actual image count stays the same if I take a snapshot before I 
open text editor and after I close the editor.  I'm not sure where the 1 image 
diff comes from, but since the image count stays the same, I will consider this 
NOT a leak.
